panels.description: Cette métrique indique la consommation du CPU par rapport à la limite de la charge de travail utilisateur d'une base de données

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "DWH-SHOPNOW"
| where MetricName in ("cpu_percent")
| summarize AvgValue = avg(Average) by MetricName, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc, MetricName asc

panels.title: Average CPU%

panels.description: Cette métrique indique la consommation de DTU par rapport à la limite de la charge de travail de l'utilisateur d'une base de données

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "DWH-SHOPNOW"
| where MetricName in ("dtu_consumption_percent")
| summarize AvgValue = avg(Average) by MetricName, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc, MetricName asc

panels.title: DTU%

panels.description: cette métrique indique la quantité d’espace de stockage utilisée dans les fichiers de données d’une base de données par rapport à la limite de taille de données d’une base de données.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "DWH-SHOPNOW"
| where MetricName == "storage_percent"
| summarize StoragePercent = avg(Average) by Resource

panels.title: Used Storage%

panels.description: La disponibilité est déterminée en fonction de la base de données opérationnelle pour les connexions. Pour chaque point de données d’une minute, les valeurs possibles sont 100%ou 0%.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "DWH-SHOPNOW"
| where MetricName in ("availability")
| summarize AvgValue = avg(Average) by MetricName, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc, MetricName asc

panels.title: Availability%

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "Errors"
| project TimeGenerated, error_number_d, state_d, Severity, Message
| order by TimeGenerated desc

panels.description: Un bar chart montrant les types de “wait” par nombre de tâches impactées sur la période. Cela permet d’identifier les principaux goulots d’étranglement du moteur SQL (ex : attente sur des locks, IO, CPU…).

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "DatabaseWaitStatistics"
| summarize TotalTasks = sum(delta_waiting_tasks_count_d) by wait_type_s

panels.title: NUMBER OF TASKS AFFECTED BY EACH WAIT TYPES

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "DatabaseWaitStatistics"
| summarize AvgWait = avg(delta_wait_time_ms_d) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "DatabaseWaitStatistics"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| summarize AvgWait=avg(delta_wait_time_ms_d), MaxWait=max(delta_max_wait_time_ms_d), TotalTasks=sum(delta_waiting_tasks_count_d) by wait_type_s
| order by AvgWait desc

AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION FAILED" and TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| summarize DatabaseAuthenticationSucceeded = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "DATABASE AUTHENTICATION SUCCEEDED"
| summarize DatabaseAuthenticationFailed = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "BATCH COMPLETED"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

panels.description: Exécution d’une procédure stockée purge customer by request

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "RPC COMPLETED"
| where statement_s contains "purge_inactive_customers"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

panels.title: PROCEDURE PURGE INACTIVE CUSTOMER COMPLETED

panels.description: Exécution d’une procédure stockée purge customer by request

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "RPC COMPLETED"
| where statement_s contains "replay_purge_actions"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

panels.title: PROCEDURE PURGE INACTIVE CUSTOMER COMPLETED

panels.description: Exécution d’une procédure stockée purge customer by request

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "RPC COMPLETED"
| where statement_s contains "purge_customer_by_request"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

panels.title: PROCEDURE PURGE CUSTOMER BY REQUEST COMPLETED

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "BATCH COMPLETED"
| where statement_s startswith "CREATE TABLE"
| project TimeGenerated, statement_s

AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "BATCH COMPLETED"
| where statement_s startswith "DROP TABLE"
| project TimeGenerated, statement_s

AzureDiagnostics
| where action_name_s == "BATCH COMPLETED"
| where statement_s contains "REVOKE" or statement_s contains "GRANT" or statement_s contains "DENY"
| project TimeGenerated, statement_s
